results.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
results.overview: Peter Parker’s secret identity is revealed to the entire world. Desperate for help, he turns to Doctor Strange, but the spell goes horribly wrong...

results.title: Black Adam
results.overview: Nearly 5,000 years after being bestowed with powers, Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice...

results.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
results.overview: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family on Pandora. When a familiar threat returns, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na’vi race...
